name: Wonder World Amusement Park
overview: All of the fun and thrills of your favorite amusement parks and carnivals are now available in your living room. In Wonder World Amusement Park, you can take your customized character through a fully 3D park with five themed zones and hop on five heart-pounding interactive rides. Play through a huge variety of mini-games as you win outfits and prizes for your unique character. Step right up and test your skills in a fun filled experience for the whole family.
